name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-f7f96d67e9c49477eee8eb9bbfe7dbc665be3787 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
